类的使用
net.minecraftforge.fml.common.eventhandler.SubscribeEvent

  • 使用SubscribeEvent的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    net.minecraftforge.client  
    net.minecraftforge.common  
    net.minecraftforge.fluids  

    • net.minecraftforge.client中SubscribeEvent的使用

      注释类型为SubscribeEvent的net.minecraftforge.client中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      static void ForgeClientHandler.registerItemHandlers​(ColorHandlerEvent.Item event)  
      static void ForgeClientHandler.registerModels​(ModelRegistryEvent event)  

    • net.minecraftforge.common中SubscribeEvent的使用

      注释类型为SubscribeEvent的net.minecraftforge.common中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      void ForgeInternalHandler.checkSettings​(TickEvent.ClientTickEvent event)  
      void ForgeModContainer.missingMapping​(RegistryEvent.MissingMappings<net.minecraft.item.Item> event)  
      void ForgeInternalHandler.onChunkUnload​(ChunkEvent.Unload event)  
      void ForgeModContainer.onConfigChanged​(ConfigChangedEvent.OnConfigChangedEvent event)
      By subscribing to the OnConfigChangedEvent we are able to execute code when our config screens are closed.
      void ForgeInternalHandler.onDimensionLoad​(WorldEvent.Load event)  
      void ForgeInternalHandler.onDimensionSave​(WorldEvent.Save event)  
      void ForgeInternalHandler.onDimensionUnload​(WorldEvent.Unload event)  
      void ForgeInternalHandler.onEntityJoinWorld​(EntityJoinWorldEvent event)  
      void ForgeInternalHandler.onServerTick​(TickEvent.ServerTickEvent event)  
      void ForgeModContainer.playerLogin​(PlayerEvent.PlayerLoggedInEvent event)  
      void ForgeModContainer.registrItems​(RegistryEvent.Register<net.minecraft.item.Item> event)

      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
